text: Rose window is a word used to describe a round window design, which is similar to the many petals of a rose. Most often the term is used to describe the round windows of some churches, especially those built in Gothic style. Image:Strasburg muenster rosette westfassade.jpg|Architectural drawing of the rose window of Strasbourg Cathedral, France Image:Strassburg Rose exterior.jpg|Outside view of the rose at Strasbourg Cathedral Category:Windows (architecture)
title: Rose window
